title: ils插件伤害超高
txt_content:
用rpgitem插件做出武器,上面有个瞬间伤害(harm)的药水效果,25%触发
装了ils插件过后,只要触发一次就是50000伤害,太高了
不知道在config里面修改哪一个才能降低

replies.author: MC_Shenfeng
replies.txt_content:
ils配置内找到：
environmentalDamage:
  block_explosion:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  cactus:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  drowning:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  entity_explosion:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  fall:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  fire:
    damage: 1
    durabilityLost: 0
  fire_tick:
    damage: 1
    durabilityLost: 0
  lava:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  lightning:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  magic:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  poison:
    damage: 2
    durabilityLost: 0
  starvation:
    damage: 10
    durabilityLost: 0
  suffocation:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  thorns:
    damage: 0
    durabilityLost: 0
  damage:
    durabilityLost: 1
把magic改成0就好了
如有帮助望采纳
